isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 530 Engine Diagnostic Manual for 4000 Series Trucks (2001) - CONNECTOR AND HARNESS REPAIR - TERMINAL REPLACEMENT-SEALED WEATHER PACK AND METRI-PACK

svcproc.title: TERMINAL REPLACEMENT-SEALED WEATHER PACK AND METRI-PACK
svcproc.para: Refer to Terminal Replacement-Sealed Weather Pack And Metri-Pack .

step1.para: Cut the cable just before the insulation wings on the terminal.
Replace the seal and remove the insulation being careful not to cut any of the wire strands.
Align the seal with the cable insulation.
Position the cable in the new terminal.
Hand crimp the core wings first, then the insulation wings.

note.para: Always use the recommended crimp tool for each terminal. A detailed crimp chart is included in the repair kit.

step1.para: Solder all hand crimped terminals and electrically check for continuity.
Replace the terminal in correct connector cavity.
